entry.title: [GRA4][Dedicated Servers] - Rooms GRA0404 - GRA0406 incident notification
entry.content:
Feb 24, 12:36 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers has been resolved.
Since 23/02/2026 14:11 UTC, we experienced an incident in rooms GRA0404 and GRA0406 related to electrical equipment.
As of 23/02/2026 21:04 UTC, the services in room GRA0404 were operational again.
Our technical team worked on resolving the incident in room GRA0406, which has been fully resolved since 24/02/2026 11:27 UTC.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Feb 24, 07:48 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : A significant number of servers in room GRA0406 are now back online. Fewer than 1 percent of the services in this room remain unavailable.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are working around the clock to resolve the incident.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
